name: Chinook Ops Helicopter Sim-ulator Flight Pilot
name_original: Chinook Ops Helicopter Sim-ulator Flight Pilot
description:
Top secret military objectives need to be done, you are the only one who can pull them off. Take flight in the latest exciting helicopter sim and control of an army Chinook transport helicopter, equipped with military-grade weapons. You are tasked with secret missions, so get into the pilot's seat and go on flying transport missions in tropical island environment!

FEATURES:
- Amazing 3D Chinook Helicopter model
- Diverse Helicopter Flying Missions, transport troops, blow up munitions, collect important cargo!
- Exciting Free Play Mode!
- Experience the world in Jeep Mode
- Refined helicopter flight controls
- Both touch and tilt configuration
- Massive open world tropical environment
- Intelligent weather system: Sunny, Rainstorm, Lighting, Snow, Wind
- Unique Chinook Helicopter upgrades: Wrecking ball, super powerful magnets, heat seeking missiles, and more!
- High quality animation sequences


Our game comes packed with 20 exciting missions (more to come!) where you can take control of an army Chinook helicopter and pull off action-packed objectives that involve, rescuing stranded soldiers, retrieving important packages, firing heat-seeking rockets at enemy truck, clearing the way for your fellow army cadets with the help of specialized helicopter attachments, like a wrecking ball!


Put your chopper flying skills to the test and carry out important objectives in the latest flight simulator, Chinook Ops Helicopter Simulator Flight Pilot!
